âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Realtime translate â€¢ OCR (TesseractOCR, Windows OCR, NHOcr, Easy OCR) â€¢ Machine translation (Naver Papago, Google Web, Google Sheet, ezTrans, DeepL) â€¢ Language Patch with using DB â€¢ Multiple OCR areas
ðŸ“– Summary: MORT is a real-time game translator that extracts dialog from the screen using OCR and translates it using machine translation services or a database. It supports multiple OCR engines and translation services, allowing users to play games in foreign languages with real-time translated subtitles. The program is designed for Windows and requires .NET 7.
